Processing

Class Chessboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Processing.PositionedObject
      • Processing.Chessboard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XMLSerializable

    public class Chessboard
extends PositionedObject
implements XMLSerializable
    The Class Chessboard. Class operating with game data - initializes chessboard
    Author:
    Piotr Ruciñski

        public Chessboard(processing.core.PApplet parent,
                  Vector3 pos,
                  Player one,
                  Player two)
        Instantiates a new chessboard.
        Parameters:
        parent - the instance of PApplet containing chessboard
        pos - the position of chessboard in Applet
        one - the player number one - white
        two - the player number two - black
